snippet: In an excerpt from this new book, "Man vs. Markets," Paddy Hirsch explains how bonds made up of everyday mortgages gave rise to a debt boom that eventually sank the economy.
abstract: In an excerpt from this new book, "Man vs. Markets," Paddy Hirsch explains how bonds made up of everyday mortgages gave rise to a debt boom that eventually sank the economy.

headline.main: The Boom (and Bust) That Your Mortgage Bonds Built
